wikipedia_page.main:
George Henry Sherwood (1878 – 10 October 1935) was a British Labour Party politician.
The son of a miner, Sherwood became a railway employee, and was Mayor of Wakefield.He was elected at the 1923 general election as the Member of Parliament for Wakefield, but defeated in 1924. He regained the seat in 1929, but was defeated again in 1931.

response: Hillman was elected MP for Wakefield in the 1931 general election, defeating the incumbent Labour MP, George Henry Sherwood, by 4,107 votes. Hillman was 64 years old when elected. He did not serve long as an MP. After suffering from heart trouble, he died of bronchitis in March 1932. He had asked five questions but did not make a speech in Parliament.
